How It Works?

On scheduling your e-waste request through our site, we will ensure the setup of timely e-waste quantities and send them to your recycling plant to provide a complete end to life solution of e-waste disposal.

Step One

Fill the required details to the request for the e-waste on the demand of the firm.

Step Two

Get into contact for further information transfer to built the partnership.

Step Three

We will deliver the e-waste scrap to your recycling plant location on time.
